mapper.select:
SELECT d.id as id, d.dic_type_name as dicTypeName, d.create_time as createTime, d.update_time as updateTime, d.user_id as userId, u.login_name as loginName FROM sys_dictype d LEFT join sys_user u ON u.id = d.user_id WHERE 1=1
and (d.dic_type_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dictype (id, dic_type_name, remark, user_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{dicTypeName}, #{remark}, #{userId}, #{createTime});
